title: Work - variable force changing kinetic energy

content.question: An object of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> moving in the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-direction on a surface with negligible friction is pushed by a variable force <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>F</mi></math> parallel to its motion. The applied force varies with the object’s position as shown in the graph. At <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the object’s velocity is <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. What is the object’s kinetic energy at <math alttext="x equals x sub lowercase f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half F sub 0, end sub, times x sub lowercase f, end sub, plus one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>

<math alttext="one half F sub 0, end sub, times x sub lowercase f, end sub, minus one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>

<math alttext="F sub 0, end sub, times x sub lowercase f, end sub, plus one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>

<math alttext="F sub 0, end sub, times x sub lowercase f, end sub, minus one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one half F sub 0, end sub, times x sub lowercase f, end sub, plus one half m times v sub 0, end sub, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
